prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Drums, Reed, Bass, Guitar, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
Organ, Drums, Reed, Bass, and Guitar are the instruments featured in this song, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Organ, Drums, Reed, Bass, and Guitar, but Piano is not included.

Style 3:
No Piano is present in this song, which instead features Organ, Drums, Reed, Bass, and Guitar.
